title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! Special
title_jp: 家庭教師ヒットマンREBORN! ボンゴレファミリー総登場! ボンゴレ式修学旅行、来る!!
synopsis: An internet-only stand-alone special episode of Katekyo Hitman Reborn! on the Shounen-Jump website, where the main characters go to various tourist spots in Japan. It will be made available on DVD in July 2010, and extra scenes will be included.
